response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it will bring you immense satisfaction. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special price. For you, this means securing a piece that is worth $8,000, but today, you have the chance to own it for $7,500. Don't miss out on this unique opportunity to elevate your experience with our product. Let's make this deal happen!", "product_price": 7500}
